verses.text: Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* setim \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w which|strong="H6086"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* many broad, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w*, foursquare, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6438"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H4480"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* thou shalt cover \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5178"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* uses thereof pans \w to|strong="H5178"\w* receive \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ashes|strong="H1878"\w*, \w and|strong="H5178"\w* tongs \w and|strong="H5178"\w* fleshhooks, \w and|strong="H5178"\w* \w firepans|strong="H4289"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5178"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* grate \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* manner \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w*: \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H7098"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* which \w shall|strong="H4639"\w* be \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*,

Which thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hearth \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* grate \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* two \w bars|strong="H0905"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* setim \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w which|strong="H6086"\w* thou shalt cover \w with|strong="H6823"\w* plates \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt draw \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w sides|strong="H6763"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* solid, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* empty \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w hollow|strong="H5014"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* inside, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* shewn thee \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* whereof \w southward|strong="H5045"\w* there \w shall|strong="H8486"\w* \w be|strong="H0259"\w* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w twisted|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w with|strong="H6242"\w* \w as|strong="H3701"\w* many \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, the heads \w of|strong="H5982"\w* which \w with|strong="H6242"\w* their engraving \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3701"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w manner|strong="H3651"\w* also \w on|strong="H6285"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* there \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w be|strong="H3701"\w* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w a|strong="H3651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* cubits \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* many \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H3651"\w* heads \w with|strong="H3651"\w* \w their|strong="H3651"\w* engraving \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

But \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, that looketh \w to|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, there \w shall|strong="H6285"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* as many \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0520"\w* that \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* also \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, which looketh \w to|strong="H4217"\w* \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \w there|strong="H6924"\w* \w shall|strong="H6285"\w* be \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0520"\w* which there shall be for one \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w and|strong="H5982"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w and|strong="H5982"\w* as many \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5982"\w* \w in|strong="H3802"\w* \w the|strong="H7969"\w* \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* there shall be \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H6240"\w* cubits, \w with|strong="H5982"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w and|strong="H5982"\w* as many \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8504"\w* \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w entrance|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* there \w shall|strong="H4639"\w* be \w made|strong="H4639"\w* a \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w violet|strong="H8504"\w* \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* twice dyed, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w twisted|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w with|strong="H6242"\w* embroidered \w work|strong="H4639"\w*: it \w shall|strong="H4639"\w* \w have|strong="H8179"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w with|strong="H6242"\w* \w as|strong="H8179"\w* many \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* garnished \w with|strong="H3605"\w* plates \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* heads \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0520"\w* \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* shall take up \w a|strong="H7341"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, \w the|strong="H0520"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w* shall be \w of|strong="H0134"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* it shall be made \w of|strong="H0134"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w twisted|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* shall have \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w of|strong="H0134"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* uses \w and|strong="H5178"\w* ceremonies, \w and|strong="H5178"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pins \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w it|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H5178"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, thou shalt make \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* thee \w the|strong="H0853"\w* purest \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w olives|strong="H2132"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w beaten|strong="H3795"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* pestle: \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w burn|strong="H5927"\w* \w always|strong="H8548"\w*,

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hangs \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w order|strong="H2708"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* give light \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* observance \w throughout|strong="H1755"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* successions \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
